Reviews.Title: No refund!
Reviews.Author: Nora
Reviews.Content: I had to wait for 1 month to get it! They never mentioned that it would be shipped from China, there were no 3 or 4 days delivery options. So I waited. I received it in 30 days. I used it for 3 days only. It kept on turning off by itself, specially in the middle of conversation. My friends complained that they couldn't reach me. I decided to send it back (note that time for returning the item without being charged is 30 days and I had been using it for 3 days after 30 days delivery). I wrote Amazon and they said it was too late. I contacted the seller, and the seller started to bargain with me saying that they would send me an extra battery and a charger. I refused because the problem was with a phone itself. They bargained again to send me a replacement phone. What??? To wait for replacement for another month??? Thank you!In the end I sent them the phone back and they supposed to refund my money. It has been 2 months now! I NEVER GOT MY MONEY BACK! INSTEAD I LOST MY TIME, MY NERVES AND MY MONEY AGAIN TO SEND THE ITEM BACK TO CHINA!!! FANTASTIC!

Reviews.Title: nice but
Reviews.Author: mysunnyisle "mysunnyisle"
Reviews.Content: Pros: nice style/shape, small & handy, easy useCons: metal casing got warm/hot after 5-10 min on the phone from the battery (original nokia battery)  short battery life (3-4 hours talk time)After about 1.5 years the charger plug (hole) did not work properly and the program kept freezing. was not able to use anymore

Reviews.Title: NOT SATISFIED
Reviews.Author: Karen Kristie Ong
Reviews.Content: THE ITEM I RECEIVED LOOKS FAKE AND OLD. I AM NOT SATISFIEDI EVEN WANT TO RETURN IT. I HAVE TRIED ORDERING CELLPHONE BEFOREBUT THIS ONE IS NOT GOOD.

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS PHONE
Reviews.Author: lANI
Reviews.Content: I've use this phone for 5 years. Now just changing battery. It's true that you can use it for 3-4 hours. But it's not a problem for me.

Reviews.Title: Purchase review
Reviews.Author: Good Buyer
Reviews.Content: Good phone and received on time. It is durable, looks prety, I recommend to any one who needs the basic phone.

Reviews.Title: nokia 6300
Reviews.Author: You the man
Reviews.Content: Avoid itOne site ranked it an 8.3 out of 10but isnt a phone suppose to have good signal quality[...]I cant even call from my homedont believe everything you read online

Reviews.Title: Nokia 6300
Reviews.Author: Andjelko Mitic
Reviews.Content: I`m very satisfied with the  phone.For a long time i`ve been wanted to buy it, and finnaly I did.I recieved it in a box unpacked, all new...:)Once again great phone.
